text.page:
421
091-211a @#/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa/ /dus gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum gyi rgyus/ /sdig smin las grub lha dang lha ma yin/ /dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'di ru/ /sha khrag dmar la rol pa'i lha mo khyod/ /lha yi g.yul ngo rgyal bar zhal 'ches la/ /lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod/ /
